TILE.name: Active Members
TILE.where: (is_active = true and entity_id Not in (0,1) and function_role= 'member')

TILE.name: Total contributions
TILE.where: (entity_id Not in (0,1) and is_paid = 'True' and expired='false')

DESK.name: Files
DESK.GRID:
> sys_file_id table_id table_name file_name file_type
table_id table_name file_name file_type details

FORM.name: Details
FORM.COMBOLIST: person_title Miss Mr Mrs Dr Prof

FORM.name: Details
FORM.COMBOLIST: person_title Miss Mr Mrs Dr Prof

DESK.name: My account
DESK.GRID:
> investment_id investment_type_Name maturity_date invest_amount yearly_dividend withdrawal_date withdrwal_amount period_years approve_status
Apply for Investments
entity_id approve_status return_on_investment investment_type_id invest_amount maturity_date period_years withdrawal_date details

FORMVIEW.name: Members
FORMVIEW.gohint: Follow this link to update your details

FORM.COMBOLIST: interval_days Weekly Fortnightly Monthly Bi Annually Annually

FORMVIEW.gohint: Follow this link to update your details

DESK.GRID:
> sys_email_id sys_email_name title
sys_email_name title details
> sys_email_id table_id table_name sys_email_name sys_emailed_id email_type emailed narrative

FORM.name: Entitys
FORM.COMBOLIST: function_role member admin Client Staff Supplier
